issue.title: [CF 112] Problem Tracking Nature's Grace CD
issue.body:
Using version 4.0.3a

I'm simply trying to track the cooldown for the Nature's Grace talent for Druids so I know when to cast another spell to activate it again.

Talent information can be found here:

http://www.wowhead.com/spell=61346

The spell has a 60 second cooldown before it can be activated again, but I can't seem to track the cooldown for it. I've tried by name, and by spell ID. I can get it to show as a buff when the ability activates, but when I switch it to cooldown to track when it will come available again, it never activates.

Am I missing something? I've checked all of the common things posted in your pages.

Any help would be appreciated.


> Posted by CurseForge user DoubleDizle | Imported from CurseForge issue #112 | Raw

comments.body:
You can close this ticket, I figured out the issue. I was trying to use the regular Cooldown setting, which doesn't work for this ability. I changed it to an Internal Cooldown and it started working.


> Posted by CurseForge user DoubleDizle
